name: Squash (Jerrin Thomas)
description:
Squashy Traffic

Traffic??? Fix it!!!

This is a game about managing a Road Junction by controlling the traffic lights.
You should at all costs avoid a situation where the traffic is unfixable.
The cars pass through your raod you earn coins.
You can use coins to repair damaged traffic lights when they need maintenance.

Controls :
Mouse click on the traffic lights and choose a signal if you want to change it.

Future plans:
Add Upgradable roads, poth holes, pedestrains, bicycle lanes, subways etc.
You will get notifications from politicians, officers etc. to clear roads and make way for them.
Completing these tasks will give you extra coins.
But...
The main feature we want to add is time rewind in exchange of coins.
This will allow the player to fix a situation in which there is a car crash.
